trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Milwaukie
There was one other sighting in Milwaukie on or around September 7th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsi have seen u.f.o s's on 3 different days.the first one i saw was flashing silver and black..i have photos of that event,of it being black then silver again.the second sighting was a mass sighting of between six in one photo and 30 or so in another but there was at least 50 60 of them.....they were like skipping across a pond moving around eachother then there were lines that would connect them,then they would blink out of existance and back again multip[le times untill we coulnt see them anymore....the last sighting i got a good photo,as good as i could get,of a u.f.o hovering then darted off to my left,back to the right,then straight at mt direction,poof it disapeared then reapeared above a tree in my neighbors yard.....all my photos have the time and datr right...the am is wrong it was pm when i got these..all of them... the first sighting i saw because a huge twin prop military plane fley over my house and it was loud...so naturaly i looked up at it and about 3 min after the plane left my sight i caught the ufo in the sky glowing silver and black....2 sightings was seen by me,melanie stone,my 5 year old daughter...and i got pics of these..this was the mass sighting day..the last ufo i saw off of my left,doing the samr thing as the first ufo,but this one was wobbling very fast,then it would stop.it went to my right,back to the left and flew my direction for a sec before disapearing and reapering behind my house over my neighbors tree.........it had grey matter comming from the bottom of it before it vanished before my eyes..i think i found a hotspot.i was in total awe of these objects.i see hellichopters and airplaines all day and night,ive never before seen anything like this before....lookl at the times and dates on these photos..i have alot more photos.
Summary: the ufo's all of them i saw through my bushnells.they are round with a wierd ring around them...very bright glow radiates from them.
